means: 符合语言习惯的，成语的

sentence.Network_en: She speaks fluent and idiomatic English.
sentence.Network_cn: 她讲一口流利地道的英语。

sentence.Network_en: In our reading we should always be alert for idiomatic expressions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在阅读过程中应经常注意惯用法.

sentence.Network_en: In his lecture, he bore down on the importance of idiomatic usage in a language.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在演讲中着重强调了语言中习惯用法的重要性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版高中英语必修5单词表_百度知道 ... &imaginative adj. 富于想象力的 &idiomatic adj. 惯用的 &negative n. 底片.
符合这种习惯就会比较地道(idiomatic)，别人看起来清楚易懂。不符合这种习惯就会变得比较笨拙(awkward)、 不地道(unidiomatic)， …
使用一些惯用法（idiomatic）和较不常见（less common）的表达？看来词汇方面考官要关注的不仅有数量还应该有词汇的等级，考生 …
高二英语必修五,第四单元单词_百度知道 ... gifted 有天赋的；有才华的 idiomatic 惯用的；通顺的 housewife 家庭主妇.

list.abs: 所谓惯用语（idiomatic expressions），顾名思义，就是两个或两个以上的字合组而成一个固定短语，具有个固定意思，有时，如片语 …
TOEFL短语词组 ... ice cube 近似立方形的冰块 idiomatic expressions 习惯表达法 if sorts 勉强称得上的；各种各样的.
雅典娜的单词本——杂篇 ... Hyperinformation 超额信息赖斯 Idiomatic translation 地道翻译比克曼 Imitation 拟译 1.德莱顿.
find expression in ... hot oil expression 热压油法 idiomatic expression 成语性词语 implicit expression 隐式.
词汇学常用词汇中英对照表 - 豆丁网 ... I idiom 习语 idiomatic expression 习惯表达 idiomaticity 习语程度.
...影响而产生的错误,避免不合习惯的类推,从而提高运用地道英语(idiomatic English)进行交际的能力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Greek idiōmatikos 'peculiar, characteristic', from idiōma (see idiom)

entry.def: Idiomatic language uses words in a way that sounds natural to native speakers of the language.

example.tran: 她对地道英语的娴熟使用

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or conforming to idiom;

auth_sentence.content: Delightfully idiomatic woodwind solos stand out impressively.
auth_sentence.res_content: Delightfully idiomatic woodwind solos stand out impressively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Delightfully idiomatic woodwind solos stand out impressively.

auth_sentence.content: It was from her that Agatha learnt her idiomatic and fluent French.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was from her that Agatha learnt her idiomatic and fluent French.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was from her that Agatha learnt her idiomatic and fluent French.

auth_sentence.content: Pappano and company really understand its idiomatic style like no one else on disc.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pappano and company really understand its idiomatic style like no one else on disc.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pappano and company really understand its idiomatic style like no one else on disc.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: idiom[n.习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色]+atic表形容词→adj.惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
idiot[n.白痴;极蠢的人;笨蛋]+cy表名词→idiocy愚蠢
idio自己的+gloss词语,语言+ia病→自由自己懂,别人不能理解的语言

stems_affixes.value_cn: 个人签名,[组织等的]标记,签名,商标[注意与ideograph区别]
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+graph写,图→个人写的,个人[或特殊图标]图标→标记,签名,商标
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+lect说→个人说的话

stems_affixes.value_cn: 习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+m→特殊的语言
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+syn共同,综合+crasy状态→个人特殊综合症
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+ot人→idiot特殊的个人→白痴

means.word_mean: 符合语言习惯的,成语的

sentences.en: In his lecture,he bore down on the importance of idiomatic usage in a language.
sentences.cn: 他在演讲中着重强调了语言中习惯用法的重要性。

sentences.en: In our reading we should always be alert for idiomatic expressions.
sentences.cn: 我们在阅读过程中应经常注意惯用法。
